privacy.title: Privacy Policy Consent
privacy.text2: By accessing, you agree to share your data (IP address, cookies, location, etc.) with Google and send it overseas.
privacy.text3: We anonymize your data for privacy protection!
privacy.warning: By continuing to access, you agree that your data will be sent to the US! US laws may apply!
